intro: Psychotria nossibensis, commonly known as the Cameroon Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical Africa, particularly found in Cameroon and the Central African Republic. The plant is characterized by its glossy, elliptical leaves and produces small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments within dense forests. Psychotria nossibensis is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical uses, though further research is needed to fully understand its properties.
